EmailTemplate.subject: See you Thursday 12/4 at the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop coming up tomorrow, December 4, 2014, in Bangalore. We look forward to seeing you!
Please bring your laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands-on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop prior to attending following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop Thursday, December 4, 2014 9:15am - 5:00pm (breakfast, morning tea & lunch provided) Agenda <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/india>
EMC India COE EMC Software & Services India Pvt Ltd Bagmane World Technology Centre-SEZ Marathalli Ring Road, Dodanekundi Village Bangalore 560037 India Transportation & Driving Directions <https://www.google.com/maps/place/EMC+Corporation,+KR+Puram+Marathahalli+Ring+Road/@12.981664,77.693874,15z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x0:0x8a99c000f170374b>
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands-on Sections
- Git <http://git-scm.com/downloads> ("brew install git")
- A GitHub <https://github.com> account (download sample apps here <https://github.com/Lcrowther-pivotal/cf-community-workshop/blob/master/demos/PCF-Demo.zip?raw=true>) - Your favorite Java editor (Eclipse, IntelliJ IDEA, Netbeans) - The Cloud Foundry CLI <https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cli/releases> - download the latest!
- A FREE account on Pivotal Web Services - create a 60-day trial with no credit card at https://run.pivotal.io
Please bring a copy of your confirmation upon arrival with a government issued photo ID.
QUESTIONS OR COMMENTS? Contact Rushenka Perera by email <mailto:rperera@pivotal.io> with any questions or special requirements.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
EMC is not responsible for lost or stolen items. If you bring a laptop or other personal items with you to the conference venue, you do so at your own risk. Do not leave any items unattended.
